At Facebook, 26-year-old founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg calls the shots in an entrepreneurial culture that has enticed dozens of engineers to leave Google Inc. to work for the social networking company. for an executive who is transitioning out of the CEO role- and may even be unusual for sitting CEOs, said David Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years. `` It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat,'' Wise said. ' SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate.'' He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better.`` Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan .
